Text: those who follow someone they never seen or heard should be sent to a remote island never to be heard of again , just plain stupid brain activity scaring people into falsehood

the biggest threat to your'e and mine freedom and choice, they would like to see all infidels(you and me) dead, they don't wish to intergrate or join any part of the community except theirs, they want sharia law and the right to honour killings and stonings for the defenceless and weak, all this from what they pedal as the most peaceful religion. beware there subversion of our way of life is spreading.

let me talk to those who talk about no freedom in islam,,,,, actually it give a full freedom , BUT BUT BUT BUT BUT BUT
this freedom is restricted when it start to harm others or even youreslf, so what freedom your community provide?????? stealing, illegal sex, gays, eating and drinking bad food that affect your health negatively????? do you think that when a drunk drive a car and kill people this is a freedom??? what the hell is a freedom that make all the others unsafe from robbery or raped ?? or what a freedom that make you harm your self then others by smoking or drinking


And about the aim of muslims in killing unbelievers!!!!! I think you never read quran, If you did then you will have noticed that It only ask for killing those who try to kill you first, and please look for this sentence in quran Surat Al-M??'idah ayah 32(((whoever kills a soul unless for a soul or for corruption [done] in the land - it is as if he had slain mankind entirely. And whoever saves one - it is as if he had saved mankind entirely)))

and this in Surat Al-'An`??m ayah 151 (((Say, "Come, I will recite what your Lord has prohibited to you. [He commands] that you not associate anything with Him, and to parents, good treatment, and do not kill your children out of poverty; We will provide for you and them. And do not approach immoralities - what is apparent of them and what is concealed. And do not kill the soul which Allah has forbidden [to be killed] except by [legal] right. This has He instructed you that you may use reason.")))

and please look carefully at this one that tell to fight only those who fight you:
Surat Al-Baqarah, ayah 190 (((Fight in the way of Allah those who fight you but do not transgress. Indeed. Allah does not like transgressors.)))

please know before you judge on anything


ACTUALLY THE AIM OF ISLAM IS TO BRING PEOPLE TO RIGHT NOT TO KILL THEM , AND NO ONE SAID THAT WE DON'T WANT TO INTEGRATE THE COMMUNITY THIS IS YOUR MIND TELL YOU THIS,  read the quran and you will see that there is no single word asking for killing infidels UNLESS they start the fight, 

best regards all wish allah guide you to the straight way

Ahmad
